title: At The Deep End
description: Jaded and still recovering from a broken three year engagement, Bri Davis decides to go on an annual girls trip in the hopes of burying her heart ache in the sands of Miami Beach. The trip takes a turn for the better when she meets the charismatic and flirtatious WNBA player, DeeDee Renier who immediately makes her rethink her life choices.As they find solace for their personal pain between the sheets, Bri dives head first into a fast and confusing toe curling romance she hopes wonâ€™t leave her stranded.
author: Deja Elise
